Posts.Content: healthy133 wrote: It's been two years since I finished my breast cancer treatments.  I had lumpectomy surgery, chemo & radiation.  This occurred on my left side.  I received radiation on my left breast, in the armpit area and down the side to below my breast.  It still feels like my whole left side is bruised, for lack of a better description.  Whenever I try to workout my upper body, it feels like I was used for a punching bag.  Not so much swelling, but it sure is painful.  Was wondering if anyone else is going thru this and have you found any remedies.  Maybe there's even someone out there who has gotten past this point and can offer a little hope and encouragement:):):):) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain all over radiation site healthy133 evergreen9

Posts.Content: May 11, 2012 09:18PM healthy133 wrote: Binney..........thank you so much for your reply.  I will definitely check this out.  Appreciate your time.
